definition: one of the characters used in kwukyel (phonetic "ra"), an ancient Korean writing system
"dot" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 3)/see also 點|点[dian3]

sentences.english: The man always holds woman's hand closely to grasp.
sentences.chinese: 男亽始终抓住女亽旳掱紧紧握著。

sentences.english: The man always holds woman's hand closely to grasp.
sentences.chinese: 男亽始终抓住女亽旳掱紧紧握著。

sentences.english: My most sincere loving a lifetime man , Yan Yang .
sentences.chinese: 皒一生最挚爱的男亽，颜阳。
诺贝尔奖冇嚸诎亽噫外。

sentences.english: Music to tear you to pieces. You close your eyes.
sentences.chinese: 音乐让亽心碎，鉨闭上眼睛。

sentences.english: Because of you are that my lifetime is middle most ?
sentences.chinese: 因为妳饣皒一生中最挚爱的男亽。

sentences.english: So, to achieve environmental protection, every one should be responsible.
sentences.chinese: 所苡，崾做到保护环境，亽亽冇责。

sentences.english: So, to achieve environmental protection, every one should be responsible.
sentences.chinese: 所苡，崾做到保护环境，亽亽冇责。

sentences.english: I walk the walk alone no matter whether people know at all.
sentences.chinese: 皒独自向前赱，不管其他亽知罘知道。

sentences.english: A manger should be accessible to his staff.
sentences.chinese: 𠇹理应该使职员感到泙易近亽。

sentences.english: My heart all the people you can see only a detour.
sentences.chinese: 涐旳用心所有旳亽都能看到只有迩一个绕行了。

sentences.english: Women need your attention every moment, and perhaps will be tired.
sentences.chinese: 女亽需要伱每时每刻旳注意，乜许会累点。

definition: to die/to lose/to be gone/to flee/deceased
old name for the Dadu River 大渡河[Da4 du4 He2] in Sichuan
